Aggron (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0305: Lairon
Pokémon
#0307: Meditite →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Aggron (TCG Pocket).

Aggron has been featured on 23 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Aggron cards are normally Metal-type or Fighting-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Aggron

Aggron
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
